murrinhpatha_verb_entries.csv.description: This is a long list of Murrinhpatha verb forms. The data should probably not be taken at face value, as I had to correct two apparently homophonous roots *la* to *ila* ('surface classifier') and *ula* ('eating classifier' (?)) from https://doi.org/10.25911/5d723cd88582b. Thus, the entries in the Verb column should probably all be longer.
